The most rewarding and clever puzzles you will ever solve in your life, jammed pact with incredible voice acting talent and well written characters and a perfect steady and balanced pace that will keep you entertained and wanting more after every puzzle you solve. Valve really out did themselves with this one! WOW! Its a 10/10 perfect game, a truly must own title you need to experience and have in your steam library! The online multiplayer is also awesome and humorous as well btw!
Probably one of my favorite games of all time
6 hours stuck on one of the puzzles, the rest was the game.
I wish i could have a portal next to my desk and the other one on the inside of the fridge door
a total brain fuck at first, but hella good story
hahaha science robot go "place portal here"
This game is a thriller, action, alomst anything imaginable. I don't like spoilers personally, so I'll keep what happens to myself. THIS GAME IS EPIC!!!
Very fun game, it really challenges the logical part of the brain. Would highly recommend.
Super Buenardo. Compralo. No hay mas que agregar.

More of the first game but a little too much of the first game, still worth playing regardless
This is the best game I have ever played.

Honestly this game is just wonderful. Even tough the was game released in 2011 the graphics are still beautiful. The story is just awesome, one of the best i have experienced and its a puzzle game. Also the game play is fun and has a lot of interesting mechanics. One of if not the best game ever made.

Great gameplay, story, atmosphere, music. Offers 2 campaigns, a single-player and a co-op one, both of which are very replayable. Community created maps offer an almost infinite amount of content. This game is an absolute classic that everyone should play.
I really enjoy this game. Along with all of the community levels and co-op. Such a great game. Fun puzzles and the like. Also really recommend Portal Stories:MEL for additional content.

OVERWHELMING GREATTTTT!!!!!

I'm GLaD it has a nice ending.

Juego 10/10 Hermosa historia, Comedia, Jugabilidad Y para mi es mejor que el 1 por mucho con muchas mas mecanicas (aunque la base del juego es literalmente colocar portales, portal 2 ofrece muchisimas mas mecanicas que lo hacen mas completo) recomendado al 100.
Good story and longer than the first one which I like

Well I really liked the game. It felt like a movie, like you were inside of a movie. The futuristic view, and bringing up how portal was created really gave me part of the story that was missing in portal. Personally I'd play it again and recommend it to many others
No words, nor videos can explain how cool is this game. Life's short, why not enjoy it while you still can?

This game is a short, fast, fun, challenging game, that once you find out the answers to the puzzles by yourself, feels really satisfying. The game also feels great, and smooth, for at least me. If you have 10 dollars, and are willing to use your brain, buy this game.
